scripts.setup-keys: cd build/onetime_note_js && npx snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 20 pot20_0000.ptau -v && npx snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot20_0000.ptau pot20_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v && npx snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot20_0001.ptau pot20_final.ptau -v && npx snarkjs groth16 setup ../onetime_note.r1cs pot20_final.ptau onetime_note_0000.zkey && npx snarkjs zkey contribute onetime_note_0000.zkey onetime_note_0001.zkey --name="Second contribution" -v && npx snarkjs zkey export verificationkey onetime_note_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.generate-witness: cd build/onetime_note_js && node generate_witness.js onetime_note.wasm input.json witness.wtns
scripts.generate-proof: cd build/onetime_note_js && npx snarkjs groth16 prove onetime_note_0001.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.verify-proof: cd build/onetime_note_js && npx snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
scripts.prove: pnpm run generate-witness && pnpm run generate-proof && pnpm run verify-proof
scripts.full-process: pnpm run build-circuit && pnpm run gen && pnpm run prepare && pnpm run setup-keys && pnpm run prove
scripts.setup-smt-keys: cd build/smt_js && npx snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 15 pot15_0000.ptau -v && npx snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot15_0000.ptau pot15_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v && npx snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot15_0001.ptau pot15_final.ptau -v && npx snarkjs groth16 setup ../smt.r1cs pot15_final.ptau smt_0000.zkey && npx snarkjs zkey contribute smt_0000.zkey smt_0001.zkey --name="Second contribution" -v && npx snarkjs zkey export verificationkey smt_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.generate-smt-witness: cd build/smt_js && node generate_witness.js smt.wasm ../../input/inclusion_input.json witness.wtns
scripts.generate-smt-witness:non: cd build/smt_js && node generate_witness.js smt.wasm ../../input/non_inclusion_input.json witness.wtns
scripts.generate-smt-witness:summary: cd build/smt_js && node generate_witness.js smt.wasm ../../input/smt_summary.json witness.wtns
scripts.generate-smt-proof: cd build/smt_js && npx snarkjs groth16 prove smt_0001.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.verify-smt-proof: cd build/smt_js && npx snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
scripts.prove-smt: pnpm run generate-smt-witness && pnpm run generate-smt-proof && pnpm run verify-smt-proof
scripts.smt-process: pnpm run build-smt && pnpm run gen-smt && pnpm run setup-smt-keys && pnpm run prove-smt
